game.name: Heaven Does Not Respond
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Heaven Does Not Respond is a psychological and analog horror simulation game set in an alternate 2005 timeline. Play as intelligence agent, exploring a retro computer interface to decrypt hidden files, watch mysterious videos, and uncover dark secrets behind a young man’s sudden death.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Heaven Does Not Respond is a psychological and analog horror simulation game set in an alternate 2005 timeline. Play as intelligence agent, exploring a retro computer interface to decrypt hidden files, watch mysterious videos, and uncover dark secrets behind a young man’s sudden death.
